[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [IWeighted](./node-core-library.iweighted.md) &gt; [weight](./node-core-library.iweighted.weight.md)

## IWeighted.weight property

The weight of the element, used to determine the concurrency units that it will take up. Must be a whole number greater than or equal to 0.

**Signature:**

```typescript
weight: number;
```
